data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: An “All-in-One” Synthetic Strategy for Linear Metalla[4]Catenanes

data.question: Who is the corresponding author for this research article?
What type of synthetic strategy is reported in the article?
data.answer: An “all-in-one” synthetic strategy for the synthesis of linear metalla[n]catenanes (n = 2–4)

data.question: What is the main goal of the synthetic strategy described in the article?
data.answer: To realize a quantitative one-step synthesis of a linear metalla[4]catenanes via the self-assembly of cyclic metalla[3]catenanes and tetracationic cyclophanes

data.question: What method was used for the absorption correction in the crystallographic analysis?
Is the crystal system of Hetero-3 monoclinic?
Was DFT calculation used to support the structure of Homo-2?
What is the role of ExBox4+ in the synthesis of metalla[2]catenanes?
data.answer: ExBox4+ acts as a π-acceptor unit in the coordination-driven self-assembly process to form metalla[2]catenanes

data.question: Did the synthesis of Hetero-3 involve the use of a dinuclear precursor?
What analytical technique was used to confirm the formation of Hetero-1?
What is the empirical formula of Hetero-2?
Was the synthesis of ExBox2+ described in the supporting information?
What is the space group of the crystal structure of Homo-1b?
What is the significance of the DFT calculation results for Homo-2?
data.answer: The DFT calculation results suggest that Homo-2 is likely a cyclic [3]catenane, as it is energetically more favorable than a linear [3]catenane structure

data.question: Was the absorption spectrum used to analyze the properties of Hetero-1, Hetero-2, and Hetero-3?
What was the yield of ExBox·OTf according to the experimental procedures?
Is the crystal system of Hetero-1 orthorhombic?
What was the method used for the synthesis of 1,6-bis(pyridin-4-ylethynyl)pyrene (L)?
data.answer: A reaction involving 1,6-dibromopyrene, 4-ethynylpyridine, CuI, bis(triphenylphosphine)palladium(II) chloride in DMF and triethylamine under reflux

data.question: What is the role of AgOTf in the synthesis of Homo-1a·OTf?
data.answer: AgOTf is used to facilitate the formation of the OTf-salt of Homo-1a by reacting with the precursor and ligand in the synthesis process

data.question: Was a mixed solution of CD3OD and CD3CN used in the NMR analysis of Hetero-2?
